01.Name: __cfduid
01.Purpose: Used by the content network, Cloudflare, to identify trusted web traffic.

02.Name: ASP.NET_SessionId
02.Purpose: Preserves the visitor’s session state across page requests.

03.Name: CookieConsent
03.Purpose: Stores the user’s cookie consent state for the current domain

04.Name: PHPSESSID
04.Purpose: Preserves user session state across page requests.

01.Name: zoom
01.Purpose: Used in context with the website’s map integration. The cookie stores user interaction with the map in order to optimize its functionality.

01.Name: _ga
01.Purpose: Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.

02.Name: _ga_#
02.Purpose: Used by Google Analytics to collect data on the number of times a user has visited the website as well as dates for the first and most recent visit.

03.Name: _gat
03.Purpose: Used by Google Analytics to throttle request rate

04.Name: _gid
04.Purpose: Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.

01.Name: _fbp
01.Purpose: Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real time bidding from third party advertisers.

02.Name: _gcl_au
02.Purpose: Used by Google AdSense for experimenting with advertisement efficiency across websites using their services.

03.Name: _gcl_au
03.Purpose: Used by Google AdSense for experimenting with advertisement efficiency across websites using their services.

04.Name: ads/ga-audiences
04.Purpose: Used by Google AdWords to re-engage visitors that are likely to convert to customers based on the visitor’s online behaviour across websites.

05.Name: fr
05.Purpose: Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real time bidding from third party advertisers.

06.Name: IDE
06.Purpose: Used by Google DoubleClick to register and report the website user’s actions after viewing or clicking one of the advertiser’s ads with the purpose of measuring the efficacy of an ad and to present targeted ads to the user.

08.Name: pagead/1p-user-list/#
08.Purpose: Tracks if the user has shown interest in specific products or events across multiple websites and detects how the user navigates between sites. This is used for measurement of advertisement efforts and facilitates payment of referral-fees between websites.

09.Name: pagead/landing
09.Purpose: Collects data on visitor behaviour from multiple websites, in order to present more relevant advertisement – This also allows the website to limit the number of times that they are shown the same advertisement.

10.Name: RUL
10.Purpose: Used by DoubleClick to determine whether website advertisement has been properly displayed – This is done to make their marketing efforts more efficient.

11.Name: test_cookie
11.Purpose: Used to check if the user’s browser supports cookies.

12.Name: tr
12.Purpose: Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real time bidding from third party advertisers.

13.Name: VISITOR_INFO1_LIVE
13.Purpose: Tries to estimate the users’ bandwidth on pages with integrated YouTube videos.

14.Name: YSC
14.Purpose: Registers a unique ID to keep statistics of what videos from YouTube the user has seen.

15.Name: yt-remote-cast-installed
15.Purpose: Stores the user’s video player preferences using embedded YouTube video

16.Name: yt-remote-connected-devices
16.Purpose: Stores the user’s video player preferences using embedded YouTube video

17.Name: yt-remote-device-id
17.Purpose: Stores the user’s video player preferences using embedded YouTube video

18.Name: yt-remote-fast-check-period
18.Purpose: Stores the user’s video player preferences using embedded YouTube video

19.Name: yt-remote-session-app
19.Purpose: Stores the user’s video player preferences using embedded YouTube video

20.Name: yt-remote-session-name
20.Purpose: Stores the user’s video player preferences using embedded YouTube video
